Topic.Title: Finished programming a game, starting a new one.

Posts.EditableText: I finished programming my first game, although it will be on the back burner, as the subject matter is very dark, and I don't think my parents or friends would enjoy it. So this time, I'm working on a game called Space Travelers. My plan is to make it an Oregon Trail type game in space. Someone's probably done this already, but I'm hoping I can accomplish it.  Unfortunately, I don't think I can accomplish it on the web version, but that doesn't mean I won't try. If anyone's tried something similar, I'd appreciate some tips.
